item.title: Winter arrived at Berlin
item.description: Winter arrived at Berlin # Finally winter seems to have arrived at Berlin as well: Looks a little like Christmas is drawing closer. Only disadvantage of the weather: One of the breaks of my bike was frozen after very few minutes. Luckily for me, my bike has one of those old-fashioned back pedal brakes ;)
